it.escape.core.client.controller.gui

Class UpdaterSwing

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.escape.core.client.controller.Updater
      • it.escape.core.client.controller.gui.UpdaterSwing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindUpdaterInterface, ClientProceduresInterface, java.util.Observer

    public class UpdaterSwing
extends Updater
implements java.util.Observer, BindUpdaterInterface, ClientProceduresInterface
    Updates the GUIModel and/or sends commands to the GUIView when a new network message arrives
    Author:
    michele, andrea

      • processMessage

        public void processMessage(java.lang.String message)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The method that is invoked whenever this class receives a notifyObserves(), because a new message has arrived to the Connection. It checks if the message corresponds to some given patterns, and then invokes the other 4 methods that check a specific kind of patterns (info, TurnRequests, events, exceptions)
        Specified by:
        processMessage in class Updater
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
